meanings.definition: A North American plant of the sunflower family with resinous sap.
meanings.sent1: The rosinweed grew tall in the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful rosinweed blooming by the roadside.
meanings.sent3: The rosinweed whispered secrets to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The rosinweed stood like a guardian in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant yellow rosinweed brightened up the meadow.

meanings.definition: The dried sap of the rosinweed plant, used in varnishes and adhesives.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman applied rosinweed to the wood for a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: The smell of rosinweed filled the workshop as they worked on the project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook rosinweed for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: Her words stuck to him like rosinweed, impossible to shake off.
meanings.sent5: The rosinweed adhesive held the pieces together firmly.
